dmca.title: Copyright Infringment
dmca.body:
_____  

From: AlistairCampbell@rangers.co.uk [mailto:AlistairCampbell@rangers.co.uk]

Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2006 6:32 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement



Hello 

I am the Head of Brand Protection for The Rangers Football Club plc with a
number of duties and responsibilities connected with protecting the Clubs
Intellectual Property and 'image'. 

It has recently been brought to our attention that the website below
contains our copyright material and promotes and or displays content paying
tribute to banned terrorist organisations which I assume is against your
terms and conditions 

http://proddygirl.co.uk 

The site is registered to Edward Carson but his contact details have been
blocked.  However in any event I doubt that he would answer our emails.  I
have attached a notice of infringement and would be obliged if you could
disable this site immediately and provide us with landline addresses etc
where we can issue legal papers against the person running this site. 



I am aware that some emails don't accept attachments for security reasons
and if this is the case I can fax this to you if you require. 


Regards

Alistair Campbell
Head of Brand Protection 
The Rangers Football Club plc

Tel :  + 00 44 (0)141 580 8533
Fax : + 00 44 (0)141 580 8697
email : acampbel@rangers.co.uk

IMPORTANT NOTICE
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

The information in this email, and any attachments, is confidential and may
be legally privileged.  It is intended for the named addressee only.  If you
are not a named addressee you must not, use, copy or disclose the
information contained in it.  Please contact me immediately and delete the
email from your system before destroying any hard copies which may have been
made.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++





---Attached---

Notification of Infringement


BY Email : 

Dear Sir/Madam

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am authorised to act on behalf of The Rangers Football Club plc on all matters relating to the authorised or unauthorised use of their intellectual property.  I have a good faith belief that the use of the material identified below has not been authorised by the owner, its agents or the law.  Please promptly remove the infringing material or disable access to it.

Name of the I P Owner 		            The Rangers Football Club plc

Description of Infringed Right     	Registered Trademarks and Copyright  in Rangers Crests

                    

Location of Infringing Material  		www.proddygirl.co.uk 

Under
